price: 46 Le même sort fut, avant cela, réservé au peuple de Noé qui vivait dans la désobéissance.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
